divs: Sighting DetailsOrbs that float in the rooms and in the head. Mind scan. Shadows float in the dark. Alien footsteps on the roof. Telepathy. Aliens making us mad. No ghosts. No demons. Just Aliens. They are responsible for it all. The government is not covering up much now. About street dark thirty, you will see. Don't just post here, read this database else what is the point? We learn now! Here! Ok.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sanford
